title: Acupuncture | MCPHS
description: NESA offers master's degrees in general acupuncture and oriental medicine, a doctorate in acupuncture and integrative health, and certification in Chinese herbal medicine.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture Acupuncture is a key field in the integrative medicine model that is transforming healthcare worldwide. Healthcare Providers Increasingly Rely on Acupuncture Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) are a popular form of complementary and integrative medicine that is widely used worldwide. Acupuncture is one of several treatment techniques utilized as part of TCM, which is medical system that has been used for thousands of years to prevent, diagnose, and treat disease. Acupuncture itself, utilizes very thin, solid needles that are pre-sterilized. These needles are inserted into various points on the surface the body and bring about a therapeutic effect by stimulating the body's natural healing systems.
